overview: The Super Simple show is a compilation of Super Simple's most popular songs and series that our fans love! This compilation is all about Halloween! Includes children's song favorites "Down By The Spooky Bay", "5 Little Monsters" & "5 Creepy Spiders" and featuring Carl's Car Wash, The Bumble Nums, Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, and More!
title: The Super Simple Show: Halloween
